Package org.variantsync.diffdetective.diff.difftree.serialize

Class TikzExporter

java.lang.Object
org.variantsync.diffdetective.diff.difftree.serialize.TikzExporter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Exporter
public final class TikzExporter extends Object implements Exporter
Exporter for TikZ pictures which can be embedded into a LaTeX document. The resulting graph is styled using TikZ styles which have to be set using \tikzset. An example for all required styles can be found in the file tikz_header.tex in the resource directory. This particular style is used by exportFullLatexExample(org.variantsync.diffdetective.diff.difftree.DiffTree,java.lang.String).

  • Method Details

    • exportDiffTree

      public void exportDiffTree​(DiffTree diffTree, OutputStream destination) throws IOException
      Export diffTree as TikZ graph into destination. The exported graph starts and ends with the tikzpicture environment and does not include surrounding LaTeX code like the preamble. For a quick way to set up a working LaTeX document see exportFullLatexExample(org.variantsync.diffdetective.diff.difftree.DiffTree,java.lang.String).
      Specified by:
      exportDiffTree in interface Exporter
      Parameters:
      diffTree - to be exported
      destination - where the result should be written
      Throws:
      IOException

    • exportDiffTree

      public void exportDiffTree​(DiffTree diffTree, GraphvizExporter.LayoutAlgorithm algorithm, OutputStream destination) throws IOException
      Export diffTree as TikZ graph into destination. Same as exportDiffTree(org.variantsync.diffdetective.diff.difftree.DiffTree,java.io.OutputStream), but allows the selection of a different Graphviz layout algorithm.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • exportFullLatexExample

      public void exportFullLatexExample​(DiffTree diffTree, String filename) throws IOException
      Exports a ready to compile LaTeX document containing a TikZ graph exported by exportDiffTree(org.variantsync.diffdetective.diff.difftree.DiffTree,java.io.OutputStream). The resulting document should be used as prototype not as ready to be published visualisation. To discourage further processing the API differs from exportDiffTree by exporting directly into a file.
      Parameters:
      diffTree - to be exported
      filename - of the destination file
      Throws:
      IOException
